name: Village Arsonist
description:
Get revenge on the village that wronged you... by burning it to the ground!

Village Arsonist is a 2D physics-based puzzle game. It started out as an experiment in making objects that catch fire when placed near other sources of fire. With enough burnable objects, you get a fun fire-spreading mechanic.

I hope you enjoy it!
